website_summaries.verdict: A fireproof battery bag that is budget-friendly and features expert construction.
pros: Flexible bag includes a rounded top and easily conforms to the shape of various Lipo batteries
Bag offers lots of space so you can charge or store multiple batteries at the same time
Crafted from high-end materials to limit the risk of potential damage from malfunctioning batteries
cons: Inside flaps can be difficult to keep in place
Bag is thin in contrast to similar options

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: Burned one of the bags in a lipo fire on purpose, did not burn down the rest of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Westover

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, a must have for your protection.
customer_reviews.text: Since I really needed four of these safe bags and the DerBlue and Nioposi ones were almost exactly the same price I bought two of each so I could compare. They're very similar and I give them both 5 stars. As you can see from the pictures the Nioposi tends to have a more rounded top, but both are flexible and shape can conform to the contents. If I need some more I might get the DerBlue ones because I like the way they naturally take on a more square shape. I highly recommend using bags like this for storing and charging your batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Wren McMains

customer_reviews.title: Safety!
customer_reviews.text: MUST USE THESE.....keep your home safe! I have two batteries for my Kraton and its great piece of mind. My friend left his LiPOs unattended while charging overnight! Dumb! and the little battery exploded making horrible amounts of smoke in his house!!! You have to be smart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of mind for charging and storage
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment, without a lot of space to charge and store my lipo's. These are a must for reducing the risk of burning your place down! I didn't start a fire inside one to test them but I can rest easy after feeling the construction and reading reviews that this is the best solution on a budget! Each is large enough you could easy fit any type of battery inside. and good for storage too! No handle or easy way to carry them for transport, but that's not the intention of the design either!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Olson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for storing my lipo batteries and to use while charging them safely. A little tip is you buy them.....the inside flaps don't like to stay in place so I just hit the backside of them with a little hot glue to keep the in place. These are good quality and they have plenty of velcro to keep them closed tight to secure and safely store your batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: You need these for your Lipos
customer_reviews.text: Don't fool yourself. If you have any sort of Lipos you need these bags. I don't know if you have ever seen what a Lipo does when it is punctured but it's not pretty. These are a good size to store your little 2 -3 S batteries. Probably too small for your bigger 4 - 6S batteries. Gives you good peace of mind that you're not going to burn your house down.
customer_reviews.author: Will Burns

customer_reviews.title: Standard LiPo Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's your basic LiPo bag. It is a bit harder to use for very small batteries, like a 2s 300mAh battery, but works pretty well with some of the larger 4S batteries I play with. I've seen a LiPo fire once before, where a battery somehow shorted during charge, but it was in a LiPo bag (not this exact model) and caused no further problems. After seeing that, I knew that when I started messing around with hobbies that involved LiPos, I needed some of those fireproof bags.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Teav

customer_reviews.title: Works great for battery storage
customer_reviews.text: All i can say for now is these are a great value for the money. they appear to be well built and i use them for charging and storage of my 5000mAh Dynamite Reaction 3S lipos. I hope to never have the need to make a review on how they handle battery failures or fires. I will continue to use these nice bags and with any luck i will never experience either type of failure.
customer_reviews.author: Chvylove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for XT-30 and XT-60 Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my batteries safe from damage and my other stuff safe from the possibility of the batteries catching fire. I can fit comfortably 8x 850 mah 4s tattu rline XT-30 batts in the one. Also can fit 3x lumenier 2250mah 4s along with a 3s 1300mah in XT-60 in the other. Nice it comes with two No problems and material is sturdy. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Senlo

customer_reviews.title: Fits, and is for multiple sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 22.2 volt batteries for my R2 D2 unit. I was a little concerned about the size, but they fit in there pretty snuggly. It looks like with the velcro it's meant to fit a few different size batteries. I definitely like that there are open ends so that the balance indicator/alarm and charging cable can stick out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that I could safely store my Lipo batteries and these were just the right size. I have not tested their fireproof quality, but I purchased based on good reviews, the size I needed, and price. They fold very compact (they come folded) but seem to be very sturdy, and the closure in pretty grippy. Based on my needs and my search for a compact bag this one so far is a 5 to me.
customer_reviews.author: B Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: which is a good thing. However
customer_reviews.text: I havent had an oppertunity to test the true purpose of these battery bags...which is a good thing. However, they appear well made, and house my 3s 1300mah batteries easily.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage, not so much for a protection method while charging
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for storage of lipos while not in use, but my intent of getting them was to allow for charging batteries and protection while charging. This is not really the product's fault though because the lack of cord length of 99% of lipo batteries makes it virtually impossible to hook batteries up to a charger if they are protected in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you charge your LIPO batteries, large or small, YOU NEED THESE!
customer_reviews.text: SAFETY FIRST! I don't trust LIPO batteries, large or small, no matter who made them, or how good the charger. You shouldn't either. I am now trying to locate a fireproof bag for my LIPO lawn equipment; you have no idea how big a fire a 7.5 Amp Hour LIPO will spawn if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mbunds

customer_reviews.title: good for very small electronics
customer_reviews.text: These safe bags are well made and mostly functional, but they are not big enough to work well for a large phone or phablet. If you wanted a good safe bag for your smart phone, I would recommend a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Its nice to know all of my batteries are safe in ...
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to know all of my batteries are safe in place and not having to worry for any kind of explosion or burning my home. Since I have a lot of lipo batteries I use one bag for stored batteries that I dont use quite often and the other one for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: L.R. Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say whether these things actually do what they’re supposed to do or not because I haven’t had a lipped fire thank God, But they seem to be made of good material and they seem to be very sturdy craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: James Voshell

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack make sure it’s the size you need.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your house safe and depending on how many batteries you have it might hold them all. It holds all my drone batteries and one of my 4 cell lipo car batteries. They aren’t that large maybe the size of your hand from middle finger to thumb outstretched. But it’s exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cory H.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact Storage.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as kinda like magazine pouches for lipos for my E-Revo 2.0. Since the cars takes 2 batteries they fit great in the pouch. You get two for one price and will be getting another set of Lipos to extend my fun outside. These are 3s lipos in the picture. I'm not sure if 4S would fit as a pair in these though. I've heard horror stories of Lipos igniting out of nowhere so I figured 12 bucks is small insurance if it prevent a structure fire. At least give me enough time to get the batteries out.
customer_reviews.author: Laffinty

customer_reviews.title: Small bags for a big job.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are ok but I found that their small size coupled with the short battery wires makes fully containing the battery and charger wires difficult.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I think it could have a better exit point for the wires to come out. Maybe it is just the batteries I was charging, but just seems congested for the wires coming out.
customer_reviews.author: pepi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fire resistant
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for 2 3s1p lipos. I tested one against a flame and it is definitely fire resistant. Keep in mind it is intended to reduce the chances of damage and not completely contain the fire or explosion in the safe. For the price and peace of mind, that there is atleast something that will reduce destruction, i reccomend this product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for a hobbyist dealing with RC'S
customer_reviews.text: Great small packages to charge any type of Lipo or NIMH batteries. It will keep you safe in the case of any incident that may occur charging your batteries. The packages are built of this strong material and the Velcro secure seal is awesome. They are great for storing your lipos as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julio T.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: These Lipo storage bags are a must have for anyone using loose batteries. Charge and store in the bag for added safety
customer_reviews.author: gmb

customer_reviews.title: Good safety bag
customer_reviews.text: I use these for charging as well as storing the batteries for my rc planes. They are plenty long for my 3 cell batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Melaney

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection and decently priced
customer_reviews.text: I use these for storage/charging and discharging. Work great and hopefully I will never find out how they work for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: They fit good and appear to be well made. Hopefully I never have to find out if they work in a lipo failure.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be able to help mitigate any dangerous problems, that I may have while charging my battery. Great construction & sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BLADE

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Several YouTube videos up showing this exact bag successfully suppressing a large LiPo fire inside. I now feel safe charging my LiPos outside of the fireplace. Nice strong velcro, and holds its rectangular shape well.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Good pouch strong Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any LiPO 6 cell max I believe my 3 cell Traxxas LiPo fits just fine, good Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: They fit my Traxxas 2 cell batteries perfectly (one per bag). I am still alive so....5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tazman5150

customer_reviews.title: Safety in a attractive package!
customer_reviews.text: These single battery bags are an easy to carry way to safely carry your battery to prevent damage. I use mine to carry batteries for RC planes and these bags are just right to store and carry batteries to and from the flying field.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: safe lipo battery charging
customer_reviews.text: The only way to safely charge your lipo battery no risk of fire that has happened to me years ago, learned from that one be safe.
customer_reviews.author: towmaynerd

customer_reviews.title: Battery Safe
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to give me a little feeling of security when storing li-po batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Product i was looking for, i can put all my batteries and leave for a trip and i can be sure nothing bad will happen
customer_reviews.author: Kamil C.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for "tiny whoop" and toothpick quad LiPo batteries.
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right for the batteries used in the smaller quadcopters; "tiny whoops" and toothpick quads. The bag holds plenty of batteries and is not too big.
customer_reviews.author: ddmhtm

customer_reviews.title: Needs Slot for Cables
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hard to use properly for charging. You can't put the charger inside, and my Lipo batteries have very short sensor cables. So when charging, the bag is sorta closed and sorta not. I think a little slot in the side would be good. Maybe I'll cut one.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good battery case for protection.
customer_reviews.text: Battery cases are great and fit 2 batteries. I hope I don't have to find out if it prevents a battery fire. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold batteries while charging
customer_reviews.text: The batteries won’t go in the bag and charge, basically it’s a bag for storage. Not what I was looking for but hey it stores batteries. I have two 4S traxxas 6700s
customer_reviews.author: Advantage Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. It fits my 6S 5000 mhr Battery’s like a glove. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and works well
customer_reviews.text: Ok, love the way the bag works and its simplicity for the price. Wish it had a handle on top, but serves its purpose when transporting or charging Lipo batteries. I have 4 and will probably buy more once my drone battery inventory increases.
customer_reviews.author: Castiel

customer_reviews.title: Airsoft Lipos
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these to use for my airsoft Lipo batteries. Perfect I’ve already given them to my son and will buy more as I expand on my battery usage
customer_reviews.author: Chiaz

customer_reviews.title: good quality would buy again
customer_reviews.text: they fit 2 battery's at a time no problem and are a good quality

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish this came in the size of the battery. It is a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: westlysgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What I expected Lots of Velcro on the closure Seems like it’ll last well
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Great battery case.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with item, good price compared to like items and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: My Batteries fit fine in the bags (3S 11
customer_reviews.text: My Batteries fit fine in the bags (3S 11.1V 5000mAh) and as of now, they are working well... Seeing as I have not had a Lipo battery issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal J Mendala

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to hold 4s Lipos
customer_reviews.text: These are large enough to hold 4s Lipo batteries. Fortunately, I have not had a battery ignite, so I can't say if they are actually fireproof. Will give it overall rating of 4 stars until I'm able to verify they are actually fireproof.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Good product for peace of mind. Haven’t had a battery catch fire yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Good just to have
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of mind when charging and storing lipo batteries
customer_reviews.author: Alen G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Can hold 6 small batteries and charger in one bag.
customer_reviews.text: Especially if you're flying smaller lipos like the Syma X5 uses you can contain the charger and 6 batteries in one of them. They're great. They feel well made too.
customer_reviews.author: hngonagstrng

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cases
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I haven't had the opportunity to see these cases quell a fire, but I have been pleased with them so far. The size is great for the Phantom 1 and Syma X5-C batteries I use. They are sturdy and the velcro secures them well. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: They work great for storing batteries. They're a little difficult to charge batteries in, but mainly because lipo batteries tend to have short balance leads. They seem pretty sturdy. I hope they'll hold up if I ever do have a lipo fire.
customer_reviews.author: Erdrick

customer_reviews.title: exactley as I ordered and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly I assume but you don't know unless a battery starts on fire and thank god this has not happened to me to know if they work.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag works as intended for lipos
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags good price work as intended for my lipo batteries

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: I use these reguarly and have not had any issues

customer_reviews.title: works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: So far it works good wire can stick out why you charge making more safe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These items are great. They are well constructed and are made of high quality materials and they add an additional layer of protection when changing my LiPo batteries.

customer_reviews.title: CDs by mm2 for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Look like they're made out of pretty good fire proof material haven't had a chance to check them out but they look good I would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality but I am not planning on exploding a battery to test it. This gives me some piece of mind.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Can't say if they work or not, haven't had a fire yet. Feels like fire proof material to me, feel lIke decent quality material. Could fit 6-8 1400mah batteries for storage.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and seems to be of good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection cases
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy no itchy stuff coming off of it would recommend to all. But as I have never had a problem with a battery I couldn't say anything about its ability to keep the fire inside.

customer_reviews.title: Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Work as described we hope. Fit 2 2S batteries in each bag with no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than on fire.
customer_reviews.text: Love these and feel much safer while charging batteries and even storing them in the Yuneec Q500 hard Case. On the FB group these are the way to go. Better safe than on fire.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great value, well built. Hopefully won't ever have to see any "tests" of what it's made for lol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or traveling light
customer_reviews.text: Nice small lipo bag. Fits about 4 1500mah 3s lipos for transport or 2 batteries and a charge board for charging.

customer_reviews.title: great lipo bags for 3s up to 6s lipo power packs.
customer_reviews.text: fit both my 4 cell lipo's and my 6 cell lipo's in one and five 3s lipo's in second bag.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for our batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and was a great value. It does just what I wanted and gives my wife some peace of mind. That's good enough for me.

customer_reviews.text: Looks great items were as described havent had a battery explode yet and hopefully wont have to experience that but seems like good product for the price

customer_reviews.text: The product is of good quality. I use it for charging batteries and carrying batteries to the field.

customer_reviews.text: Rather large for 2 cell batteries, but gets the job done. Will easily fit 4 cells, probably larger. Basically the same as any other lipo safe out there.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 2s 5200mah batteries

customer_reviews.text: These are nice go to bags if you don't want to tote around the larger lunch box. They fit plenty of batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Premium look and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: These fire resistant pouches are perfect for my 6s lipo batteries since they come in a pair and I happen to have 2 batteries. I have yet to find out if they really do reduce the risk of a fire should the batteries inside catch fire.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Exactly as advertised.

product_meta.title: DerBlue 2pcs Fireproof Explosionproof Lipo Battery Safe Bag Lipo Battery Guard Safe Bag（185x75x60mm）
feature_bullets: Use: for safer charging and storage of batteries
The safest way to charge and store your lithium battery

Quality Assurance : If the product is defective, we can promise to resend a set of products; if the product does not meet your needs, we can also provide a 90-day unconditional return application; if you have other questions, please feel free to contact us by email!
